arggraph.edu: Dog dirt on the pavement requires my complete, ground-focused attention on my way to work.
This results in a lack of alertness in the road traffic comparable to a minor offense of the traffic regulations.
That's why causing such obstacles must to be more urgently punished.
Dog owners may think that dog dirt is only a harmless secretion of an animal like any other.
Yet then they misjudge its impact on road traffic.
